pkgmetadata.longdescription: Individual Dose Optimization using Population Pharmacokinetics // Personalize drug regimens using individual pharmacokinetic and pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic profiles. Using combining therapeutic drug monitoring (TDM) data and a population model, 'posologyr' provides accurate a posteriori estimates and allows you to compute the optimal individualized dosing regimen. The empirical Bayes estimates are computed as described in Kang et al. (2012) doi:10.4196/kjpp.2012.16.2.97.
